mean_cn: n. 欣赏；正确评价；增值；感谢；感激
mean_en: an ability to understand the worth, quality, or importance of something :an ability to appreciate something
word_etyma: appreciat(e)欣赏 + ion名词后缀 → appreciation 欣赏
deformation_desc: 右边的小人给左边鞠了一躬：“非常感谢！”
sentence: Appreciation of art is a skill that needs to be nurtured.
sentence_trans: 欣赏艺术是一种需要培养的技能。
